longton-contest

Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Covered Market, Longton No band to play a selection by which it had previously won a prize. 1st prize £75, 2nd £50, 3rd £35, 4th £20, 5th £15. March contest 1st (£3) Kingston Mills5 bands competed
April 8, 2012, 10:19 a.m. June 3, 2019, 8:57 a.m.
1 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
2 Black Dyke Band John Gladney Jnr William Tell [unknown arranger]

4 Hanley Town George Turner William Tell [unknown arranger]
